metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39835 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Gajim through 1.4.7. The vulnerability allows attackers, via crafted XML stanzas, to correct messages that were not sent by them. The attacker needs to be part of the group chat or single chat. The fixed version is 1.5.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-39835` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gajim - 1.7.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gajim package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.2-2').
